mapper.select: select item_id, name, itemQuantity, price from item
mapper.insert: insert into item (name, itemQuantity, price) values (#{name},#{itemQuantity},#{price})
insert into orders (email, address, zip_code, password) values (#{email}, #{address}, #{zip_code}, PASSWORD(#{password}));
insert into orderItem (order_id, item_id, orderCount, orderPrice) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{item_id}, #{orderCount}, #{orderPrice});
